bibl.title: Ephemeral Alexandria: The Pageantry of the Ptolemaic Court and Its Documentation.

series.title: Studies in the History of Art.

bibl.note: Aﬂ t«n pentethr€dvn grafa€, the wording used by Kallixeinos, suggests the existence of illustrated documentation. By positing this, gives an idea of the original illustrated roll through the concordance of the Kallixeinos text with imagery derived from an iconographic repertory extending from the early Hellenistic period to late antiquity. <hai ton penteteridon graphai>
